Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actors.plane

Class BossPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.actors.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.actors.plane.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.actors.plane.BossPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BossPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents the boss enemy in the game.

The boss is a challenging enemy with high health, a shield mechanic, a custom hitbox, and a health bar displayed above it. It follows a randomized movement pattern and fires projectiles at a consistent rate. The boss can activate a shield temporarily, preventing damage, and has a cooldown period before the shield can be reactivated.

  • Constructor Details

    • BossPlane

      public BossPlane()
      Constructs a Boss instance with predefined properties such as initial position, health, movement pattern, and shield mechanics.

  • Method Details

    • isShielded

      public boolean isShielded()
      Checks if the boss is currently shielded.
      Returns:
      true if the shield is active, false otherwise

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the boss by following its predefined movement pattern. Reverts movement if the boss goes out of bounds.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the boss's state, including its position, shield status, and visual effects. Also updates the positions of the health bar and shield visuals.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile from the boss. The firing logic uses a probability defined by the BOSS_FIRE_RATE constant.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      a new ActiveActorDestructible representing the boss's projectile, or null if no projectile is fired in the current frame.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage()
      Handles damage to the boss. If the boss is not shielded, reduces its health and updates the health bar.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Destructible
      Overrides:
      takeDamage in class FighterPlane

    • getCustomHitbox

      public javafx.geometry.Bounds getCustomHitbox()
      Provides a custom hitbox for the boss with padding applied.
      Returns:
      a BoundingBox representing the custom hitbox

    • getHealthBarBackground

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getHealthBarBackground()
      Gets the background rectangle of the health bar.
      Returns:
      the background rectangle of the health bar

    • getHealthBar

      public javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle getHealthBar()
      Gets the foreground rectangle of the health bar (the actual health display).
      Returns:
      the foreground rectangle of the health bar

    • getShieldImage

      public ShieldImage getShieldImage()
      Retrieves the shield image object for rendering or other operations.
      Returns:
      the ShieldImage associated with the boss.
